Whom Do We Save First With the Vaccine?" (Jan. 3, 2021).  Here a panel of public health experts give different criteria for deciding the order of vaccination.  How would you order the priority -- to reduce deaths, to reduce transmission, to distribute medical benefits equitably or to maintain the functioning of society, education and the economy?
